description: The most prestigious shipbuilding company in the world, based in Water 7. Led by Iceburg, who serves as both company president and mayor of Water 7, the Galley-La Company employs the finest shipwrights in the world. The company is known not only for exceptional craftsmanship but also for the combat prowess of its workers, who defend Water 7 from troublesome pirates.

members.role: Shipwright - Sawyer, Treenail, and Bolt specialist

keyMoments.title: Galley-La Defeats Big Helmet Pirates
keyMoments.description: The shipwrights demonstrate their formidable combat abilities by easily defeating the Big Helmet Pirates who refused to pay for their services.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Galley-La's dual nature as both craftsmen and protectors of Water 7, establishing their reputation and power.

keyMoments.title: Galley-La Introduced as Water 7's Pride
keyMoments.description: Citizens praise the Galley-La Company as the pride of Water 7, celebrating their skilled workers.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the company's central importance to Water 7's economy, culture, and defense.

goals: Maintain the highest standards of shipbuilding craftsmanship
Uphold the legacy of Water 7's shipbuilding tradition

statusHistory.description: Operating as Water 7's premier shipbuilding company

reputation: World-renowned as the finest shipbuilding company, feared by pirates for their combat strength
estimatedStrength: Several members capable of defeating pirate captains with bounties exceeding 30 million berries

description: A group of ship dismantlers and bounty hunters operating in Water 7. They take on odd jobs including collecting bounties on pirates and salvaging/dismantling ships. The family is known for their aggressive approach to business and their loyalty to their leader Franky (not yet introduced).

keyMoments.title: Franky Family Attacks Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Zambai leads members of the Franky Family in an attack on the Going Merry, attempting to capture Zoro for his bounty.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the Franky Family and initial conflict with the Straw Hats, beginning a storyline that will eventually lead to an alliance.

keyMoments.title: Franky Family Defeated by Zoro
keyMoments.description: The attacking members are easily defeated by Zoro and sent into the water.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the power gap between the Franky Family and the Straw Hat Pirates.

statusHistory.description: Operating as dismantlers and bounty hunters in Water 7

reputation: Known in Water 7 as aggressive bounty hunters and ship dismantlers
estimatedStrength: Numerous members but individually weak compared to Straw Hat Pirates

name.japanese: ビッグヘルメット海賊団

description: A pirate crew led by Captain Mikazuki, who has a bounty of 36 million berries. The crew came to Water 7 to have their ship repaired but refused to pay the Galley-La Company for their services, leading to their defeat.

keyMoments.title: Big Helmet Pirates Refuse Payment
keyMoments.description: Captain Mikazuki refuses to pay the Galley-La Company for ship repairs, claiming the price is too high.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up their defeat and demonstrates the consequences of underestimating Water 7's shipwrights.

keyMoments.title: Big Helmet Pirates Defeated
keyMoments.description: The entire crew is crushed by the Galley-La Company's shipwrights using a cannon and their combat skills.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes that bounty amounts don't guarantee victory, and showcases Galley-La's power.

statusHistory.description: Defeated by Galley-La Company at Water 7

reputation: Pirates with a 36 million berry captain, defeated in Water 7
estimatedStrength: Weak despite captain's bounty - no match for Galley-La shipwrights

description: A secret World Government intelligence agency specializing in assassination and espionage. CP9 (Cipher Pol Number 9) operates in the shadows, with agents granted permission to kill in the name of 'Dark Justice'. Several CP9 agents have been working undercover in Water 7 for five years, posing as Galley-La Company employees and other citizens while searching for the Ancient Weapon Pluton's blueprints.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Revealed to Robin
keyMoments.description: Blueno whispers 'CP9' to Robin while masked, revealing the organization's presence in Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: The pivotal moment that triggers the Water 7/Enies Lobby arc, as Robin learns that the World Government's assassins have found her.

goals: Obtain the Ancient Weapon Pluton's blueprints
reputation: Secret assassination unit known only to those within the World Government and their targets
estimatedStrength: Elite - among the World Government's most powerful agents, masters of Rokushiki martial arts
